11-14-2011, 07:37 AM #1 ISOBargains View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Jan 2003 Posts 13,745 Reese's The Perfect Seat Promotion (1/8/12) http://www.hersheys.com/reeses/promo...x?ICID=RES2005
Promotion open only to legal residents of the United States residing in the one of the 50 United States, District of Columbia or Puerto Rico, who are 18 years of age or older as of the date of entry.
Limit one (1) Play and one entry per person/text message/mobile phone/e-mail address/address per day.
ENDS AT 11:59:59 P.M. ET ON JANUARY 8, 2012
One (1) Grand Prize. The Grand Prize consists of an"Ultimate At-Home Game Day Party"to include seating for up to 50 people; food and beverages; tailgate games; tailgate tents and banners; and a half-time performance by cheerleaders and a local marching band. The football game would be viewed on a 9' x 12' video screen. Winner will also receive a REESE'S Orange 100% Genuine Leather Recliner. Game date for the"Ultimate At-Home Game Day Party"will occur between September 1, 2012 and October 31, 2012, in Sponsor's sole discretion with consultation with the winner. In lieu of the"Ultimate At-Home Game Day Party", winner may select a cash alternative of $49,677.00 payable in the form of a check to the winner. Approximate Retail Value ("ARV"): $49,677.00.
INSTANT-WIN PRIZES:
Five (5) First Prizes. Each First Prize consists of a REESE'S Orange 100% Genuine Leather Recliner. ARV: $675.00 each.
Two Thousand (2,000) Second Prizes. Each Second Prize consists of a REESE'S Premium Stadium Seat Cushion. ARV: $23.75 each.
Total ARV of all prizes offered is $100,552.00. Last edited by ISOBargains; 11-14-2011 at 07:39 AM . How are you winning anything when I keep getting this message"There was an error submitting your request"? I wasn't having any trouble up until a few days ago with this game.
